state_description: This screen allows users to visualize and manage disk space usage on their Mac. Users can see a graphical representation of files and applications, select items to review or remove, and navigate through different directories.

enables.name: Remove
enables.description: Remove the selected items to free up disk space.

enables.name: Review Selected
enables.description: Review the details of the selected items before taking any action.

enables.name: Navigate Directories
enables.description: Navigate through different directories to explore disk usage.
